data.title: Our Producers and Channels
data.text:
Bravo, US

Bravo media is the premiere lifestyle and entertainment channel focusing on original content inspired by food, fashion, beauty, design, digital and pop culture.

View Formats

NBC, US

NBC Entertainment’s quality programming has earned the network critical acclaim, awards and ratings success, finishing 2014-15 as No. 1 in the 18-49 demo for the second year in a row.

View Formats

USA, US

USA Network, the leader in cable entertainment, offers a powerful stable of dramatic, comedic and unscripted originals in more than 102 million U.S. Homes.

View Formats

E!, US

E! is the only global, multiplatform brand for all things pop culture with programming ranging from ‘Fashion Police,’ to ‘The Kardashians’.

View Formats

Oxygen, US

Oxygen Media is a multiplatform entertainment brand that targets young, multicultural women, reflecting how real women with real stories see the world.

View Formats

CNBC, US

CNBC is the leading global brand in business news and analysis, providing real-time financial market coverage in more than 100 countries.

View Formats

Telemundo Network

Telemundo Network features original Spanish language entertainment, news and sports content reaching 94% of US Hispanic TV households in 210 markets.

View Formats

Universal Television Alternative

Universal Television Alternative Studio is a leading supplier of hit unscripted content and alternative formats, and creates, develops and produces a diverse slate of original series.

View Formats

Carnival

Carnival is the UK’s leading independent drama producer, producing over 500 hours of popular drama and receiving numerous international awards.

View Formats

Lark

Based in Canada, Lark develops and produces quality scripted and non-scripted TV programming for local and international audience.

View Formats

Monkey Kingdom

BAFTA award-winner Monkey delivers high quality scripted, factual and entertainment programming for the UK and US.

View Formats

Matchbox

Matchbox develops and produces scripted and non-scripted television programmes and feature films, based in Australia.

View Formats

Sky Studios

Sky Studios is the commissioning and production arm of Sky. It is dedicated to the funding and production of great content for Sky’s 24m customers throughout Europe, and audiences worldwide.

View Formats

UCP

UCP is a premium content studio that operates with a highly curated indie sensibility, while simultaneously leveraging the power and scale of NBCUniversal.

View Formats

Universal Television

Universal Television produces or co-produces series for primetime and late night, as well as long-form and digital media projects for a variety of broadcast networks.

View Formats
